title: Contempt (Le Mepris) - Godard
description:
Contempt is the story of the end of a marriage. Camille (Brigitte Bardot) falls out of love with her husband Paul (Michel Piccoli) while he is rewriting the screenplay Odyssey by American producer Jeremiah Prokosch (Jack Palance). Just as the director of Prokosch&#039;s film, Fritz Lang, says that The Odyssey is the story of individuals confronting their situations in a real world, Le MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©pris itself is an examination of the position of the filmmaker in the commercial cinema. Godard himself was facing this situation in the production of Le MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©pris.
